name: pnp-list-formatting-recent-comments
title: Recent Comments
shortDescription: This sample shows text from the most recent items by showing them in decresing sizes as they get older.
longDescription: This sample shows text from the most recent items by showing them in decresing sizes as they get older. This is very helpful for a quick summary view of a list and is great for adding directly to a page.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
